questions.question: What is $3^2 + 4 \times 5 - 2$?
questions.hint: Exponents come first in PEMDAS! Then multiplication, then add and subtract.

questions.question: What is $(5 + 3)^2 \div 4$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then the exponent, then divide.

questions.question: What is $2 \times (15 - 3 \times 4) + 6$?
questions.hint: Inside the parentheses, multiply before subtracting! Then continue.

questions.question: What is $100 \div (5^2 - 5)$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first, then subtract. Then divide 100.

questions.question: What is $6 \times 7 - 4^2 + 8 \div 2$?
questions.hint: Handle the exponent first, then all multiplications and divisions, then add/subtract.

questions.question: What is $((8 + 4) \times 3 - 6) \div 6$?
questions.hint: Start with the innermost parentheses and work outward.

questions.question: What is $5^2 - 3^2 + 2^2$?
questions.hint: Calculate all exponents first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $48 \div (2 \times (4 + 2))$?
questions.hint: Innermost parentheses first, then multiply, then divide 48.

questions.question: What is $7 + 3 \times (2^2 + 5)$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first, then add. Then multiply and add.

questions.question: What is $120 \div (8 + 2) \div 3$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then divide left to right.

questions.question: What is $(9 - 3)^2 - 6 \times 4$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then exponent, then multiply, then subtract.

questions.question: What is $4 \times (25 - 5^2) + 10$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first! What is $25 - 25$?

questions.question: What is $8^2 \div 4 - 3 \times 4$?
questions.hint: Exponent first, then division and multiplication, then subtract.

questions.question: What is $5 \times (6 + 4 \times 2) - 10$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: multiply before adding! Then continue.

questions.question: What is $(12 \div 3 + 2) \times (8 - 3)$?
questions.hint: Solve each set of parentheses first, then multiply the results.

questions.question: What is $2^3 + 3^2 \times 2$?
questions.hint: Both exponents first, then multiply, then add.

questions.question: What is $90 - (4^2 + 6) \times 2$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first, then add. Multiply, then subtract.

questions.question: What is $((7 + 5) \div 4)^2 + 6$?
questions.hint: Innermost parentheses first, then divide, then square, then add.

questions.question: What is $6 \times 8 - 5 \times 7 + 3^2$?
questions.hint: Exponent and multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $144 \div (3 \times 4)^2$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses first, then square, then divide 144.

questions.question: What is $7 \times (12 - 8 \div 2) - 4^2$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: divide before subtracting! Then multiply, handle exponent, subtract.

questions.question: What is $(2 + 3)^3 \div 5$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then cube (multiply three times), then divide.

questions.question: What is $10^2 - 6^2 - 4^2$?
questions.hint: All exponents first, then subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $3 \times (4^2 - 6) + 20 \div 5$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first, then subtract. Continue with multiply, divide, add.

questions.question: What is $(15 - 3 \times 3)^2 \div 6$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: multiply first! Then square, then divide.

questions.question: What is $4^3 - 8 \times 6 + 12$?
questions.hint: Exponent first ($4$ cubed), then multiply, then add and subtract.

questions.question: What is $72 \div (9 - 3) \div (8 \div 4)$?
questions.hint: Solve both parentheses first, then divide left to right.

questions.question: What is $5 \times 5 - (3 \times 3 + 4 \times 4)$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: both multiplications, then add. Then $5 \times 5$ minus that.

questions.question: What is $(2^3 + 4^2) \times (10 - 7)$?
questions.hint: Both exponents inside parentheses, then multiply the result by the second parentheses.

questions.question: What is $100 - 3^2 \times 10 + 5$?
questions.hint: Exponent first, then multiply, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $6^2 \div 9 + 7^2 \div 7$?
questions.hint: Both exponents first, then both divisions, then add.

questions.question: What is $(8 - 2 \times 3)^2 \times 5$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: multiply first! Then square, then multiply by 5.

questions.question: What is $9 \times 9 - 8 \times 8 - 1$?
questions.hint: Both multiplications first, then subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $45 \div (3 + 2)^2 \times 4$?
questions.hint: Parentheses first, then square, then divide and multiply left to right.

questions.question: What is $2 \times (3 + 4 \times 5) - 3^2$?
questions.hint: Inside parentheses: multiply before adding! Then continue with exponent.

questions.question: What is $(10^2 - 6^2) \div (4 \times 4)$?
questions.hint: Both exponents in first parentheses, multiply in second, then divide.

questions.question: What is $12 \times 5 - 7^2 + 3 \times 6$?
questions.hint: Exponent and multiplications first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $((6 + 2) \times 3)^2 \div 48$?
questions.hint: Innermost parentheses, then multiply, then square, then divide.

questions.question: What is $5^3 - 4^3 + 3^3$?
questions.hint: All three cubes first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.question: What is $(7 + 3 \times 5) \div (4^2 \div 8)$?
questions.hint: In first parentheses: multiply before adding. In second: exponent, then divide. Then final division.

questions.hint: Calculate all three exponents first, then add and subtract left to right.

questions.hint: Solve each parentheses, then square the first result, then multiply.

questions.hint: Parentheses first, then both exponents, then add and subtract.

questions.hint: Inside parentheses: exponent first! Then multiply and divide left to right.
